notes: Beautifully renovated luxury apartment with high-end finishes including designer ceilings with LED lighting, modern kitchen with marble backsplash and built-in appliances, and quality laminate flooring throughout. The space is very clean with rounded corners on furniture and soft-close cabinetry which is good for baby safety, though the large windows should be checked for child locks. Excellent natural light from multiple windows, open floor plan suitable for a family.
